knowledgeBase.title: Complicated-Grief Therapy After Spousal Death
knowledgeBase.content: Client: 62-year-old widow; 16-session CGT; ICG score ↓ 45 %. CGT protocol targets separation distress and maladaptive thoughts, showing significant improvement in adaptation and return to meaningful activities like volunteer work.

knowledgeBase.title: Grief in Child After Pet Death
knowledgeBase.content: 10-year-old child; play therapy + memory box intervention; depressive symptoms resolved by week 6. Concrete rituals and therapeutic stories provide developmentally appropriate grief processing for children.

knowledgeBase.title: Anticipatory Grief Group for Caregivers
knowledgeBase.content: Caregivers of hospice patients; 8-week structured group intervention; anxiety ↓ 30 %, preparedness for loss ↑ 40 %. Evidence shows anticipatory grief work reduces post-death complications.

knowledgeBase.title: Job Loss & Identity Reconstruction
knowledgeBase.content: Middle-aged executive; narrative therapy for career loss grief; identity reconstruction and meaning-making; regained employment in 3 months with renewed purpose and career direction.

knowledgeBase.title: Homicide Survivors Program
knowledgeBase.content: 12 clients; CBT-GRIEF protocol addressing trauma-grief interface; PTSD symptoms ↓ 50 %, grief-related anger ↓ 60 %. Specialized intervention for violent loss combining trauma and grief treatment.

knowledgeBase.title: Indigenous Ritual Integration
knowledgeBase.content: First-Nations community; elder-led ceremony integration with clinical grief work; grief intensity ↓ 35 %. Ceremony-based debriefs respect cultural healing traditions while providing psychological support.

knowledgeBase.title: Dual-Process Model Oscillation Coaching
knowledgeBase.content: Widower encouraged restoration-oriented activities; DPM oscillation between loss-orientation and restoration tasks; improved adaptation metrics. Clients alternate between grieving and rebuilding life.

knowledgeBase.title: DSM-5-TR Prolonged Grief Disorder Assessment
knowledgeBase.content: Diagnostic framework and treatment planning for PGD; CGT intervention with PHQ-9 mood tracking; systematic assessment of grief persistence and functional impairment beyond 12 months.

knowledgeBase.title: Digital Peer-Support Forum
knowledgeBase.content: 1,500 users; clinician-moderated online grief community; loneliness ↓ 25 %. Digital platforms provide 24/7 peer support while maintaining professional oversight for safety and therapeutic benefit.

knowledgeBase.title: Mindfulness-Based Grief Reduction (MBGR)
knowledgeBase.content: 8-week MBGR protocol; rumination ↓ 40 %, sleep quality ↑ 25 %. Integrates mindfulness principles with grief work, addressing both cognitive patterns and somatic grief responses. Similar to eating disorder treatment integration models.

knowledgeBase.title: Grief Recovery Relapse Prevention
knowledgeBase.content: Similar to eating disorder treatment models, grief work shows high relapse rates during anniversaries and triggers. Systematic relapse prevention planning includes identifying grief triggers, coping skill maintenance, and ongoing support systems. Integration of multiple therapeutic approaches shows modest but consistent efficacy.
